alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gilchrist County through 900 PM EDT... At 836 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Andrews, or near Trenton, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Gilchrist County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
